newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Excel Machine Tools IPO subscribed 26.5 times.
newsitem.headline: Excel Machine Tools IPO subscribed 26.5 times.

text.p: Singapore-based Excel Machine Tools said on Tuesday the public portion of its new share offering had been subcribed 26.5 times.
The company had offered a total of 43.75 million shares comprising 35 million new shares and 8.75 million vendor shares priced at Singapore $0.63 each.
Excel said there were 67,801 applications for the 32.9 million shares offer to the public.
The placement shares of 6.5 million were fully taken up as well as the 4.4 million shares reserved for staff and associates.
Excel, which designs, makes and markets machine tools, plans to use the issue proceeds of about S$20.85 million to repay bank borrowings and for expansion.
